summary:
This add a new conjuration spell
A powerful Draugr capable of destroying anything in it's path.
Vanilla Assets Only.
descriptionHtml:
This add a new conjuration spell
A powerful Draugr capable of destroying anything in it's path.
Vanilla Assets Only.

[color=#ffff00][size=5]Thank you for the support and donation:
[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=3]I never thought the community here on nexus are very kind people, I cant thank enough these individuals
who supported me financially so I'll just post their name in my mod pages.
[color=#ffff00][size=3][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7889849/?]mayd4me[/url][/size][/size][/color][/size][/color]
[color=#ff7700][size=5][color=#f4f4f4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/3089165/?]Huniken[/url][/color][/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff][size=5][color=#00ffff][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4053262/?][b]C.P.[/b][/url][/size][/color]
[b]Thierry[/b][/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=5](mysterious donator)[/size][/color]

[size=4][color=#00ff00]I recommend my other conjuration spell[/color]
[/size] [size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80915/?]Conjure Dovahal (Dragon Destroyer)[/url][/size]

[color=#00ff00]There are 2 version[/color]
1.Default Version - A large walking draugr that will destroy anyone to your will
2.Normal Height Version - A normal height walking draugr that will destroy anyone to your will

[color=#00ff00]There are two ways to get the spell tome[/color]
1.Be a pussy and use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?]AddItemMenu - Ultimate Mod Explore[/url]
2.Be a Dragonborn and face the wrath of almighty Overlord on [b]Volskygge[/b] at the top with Dragon Priest Volsung on the word wall.

Story of course:
There was legend of a giant Nord warrior serving the Dragon Priest Volsung.
He exchange his service to pursue immortality now he is just nothing but a puppet to Volsung.
But he is no fool he knows what will happen to him so he write a spell for those who can free
his soul to the bind of the Dragon Priest he will aid to those who call his name.
Defeat him and he will lend his might to you.

I create this mod because I need a stronger ally that can inflict heavy damage to the enemies.
I also miss playing Overlord and Overlord 2 games.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Location: [b]Volskygge[/b] at the top with Dragon Priest Volsung on the word wall.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Requirements: Skyrim Latest Update, Dawnguard, Dragonborn
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation: Use NMM or manually install by drag and drop to Data Folder
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update to latest version: Download and Overwrite if ask
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uninstall: Use NMM or manually delete files and esp (Completely safe to uninstall anytime)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Compatibility: Compatible with all Mods because I only use Vanilla Assets
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Future Plans: Add More Vanilla Spells
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Check out my other Skyrim mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/27633780/?tb=mods&pUp=1]dlarkz skyrim mods[/url]
author: dlarkz
